pages.text: The Goblin race sports a resistance to explosions and the ability to ride wolves. Goblins are half the size of humans.$(br2)Race idea originally by CowSaysBoom
$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)50% Size$(br)$(4)-50%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(4)-40%$() Health$(br)$(2)+20%$() Movement Speed$(br)$(2)+10%$() Swim Speed$(br)

$(l)Ability: Wolf Riding$()$(br)Goblins have the ability to ride any tamed dogs by right clicking them (this costs 60% of the goblin's mana). While mounted, the dog in question temporarily becomes an Alpha Wolf. Both the Alpha Wolf and its rider receive strength and regeneration potion effects, and the Alpha Wolf can damage entities by running into them.
